title: Startup Founders Podcast – Dave McClure Interviews Marc Andreessen at #PreMoney
content: We're currently accepting applications for our fall accelerator program. Apply at angel.co/500startups NOW before the August 16th deadline.  As promised, here's a bonus episode of the podcast for your listening pleasure! This was recorded live at our PreMoney conference in July. Listen now: iTunes Stitcher RSS For videos from the event , check out our PreMoney playlist on YouTube – we'll be adding more videos to this playlist, so subscribe to the 500 Startups channel to get updates!
